troubleshooting.title: Hunspell Spell Checker is Unusable on Your Platform Error

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When trying to use the Check Spelling option, I receive the error Hunspell spell checker is unusable on your platform. It has crashed the application in a previous session.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: There are instances where determines that an internal component (such as the spell checker) has crashed the application and disables that component from running in the future (to prevent a possible future crash).

steps-informal.p:
To re-enable the spell checker component, follow these steps:
Close .
Open the %APPDATA%/com.oxygenxml folder and look for a file called something like HunspellCrashGuard*.txt. Delete that file.
Restart .
